text: Singapore home grown Yili Chye Sim Hua at Fairprice HG this morning selling at $2.28 for 200 gms or $1.14/100 gms. Malaysia Finest brand selling at $1.89 for 300 gms or $0.63/100 gms. So much for supporting Singapore products!!

Been purchasing their premium vegetables- Kang Kong, xiao bai Cai, round and sharp spinach through redmart-Lazada! Every purchase don’t disappoint. The vegetables are really fresh and leafy. Their premium round & sharp spinach are always my first choice in choosing the right ingredient for stirred fry veggie or spinach soup! I have visited their farmer market a few times and purchased the soiled grown lettuce that is only exclusive for the farmer market.

Have an awesome variety of vegetables and very clean/well prepared. Since it's soil grown, sometimes you will expect soil but they are very very well prepared. Loving the Sharp spinach which is really delicious upon making overnight banchan, simply delicious!

Also since their veges are easily accessible at Fairprice Finest/Xtra, it makes things sooooo much easier for us to get their veges. Support local and for sure, 5/5 stars from me~!

Always been purchasing Yili’s vegetables from Sheng Siong and FairPrice for many years. Recently, I started to purchase them directly from redmart to save time from grocery shopping. Glad to share that every purchase was good and fresh in their premium packaging.

Have been supporting Yili from the start. They are my to-go local vegetable brand. Even better - they are GAP certified so they are safe for consumption. Been purchasing their leafy greens for a long time from FairPrice Finest/Xtra.
